names.english: enrich blood and expel wind decoction
names.commonEnglish: Enrich Blood and Expel Wind Decoction

actions: Strengthens the Liver and Kidneys and nourishes the Yin of the Blood.
With Bai Shao, strongly nourishes Liver Blood.
Nourishes Blood, preserves Yin, calms Liver Yang and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for dizziness, blurred vision and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency or Blood Stasis.
Nourishes and activates Blood, regulates Liver and Kidneys, regulates menses and alleviates pain.
With Shu Di Huang, Bai Shao and Chuan Xiong, for menstrual irregularity, amenorrhea and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency or Stasis.
Invigorates Blood, moves Qi, releases Stagnation and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency causing menstrual problems including dysmenorrhea, scanty menses and amenorrhea.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin.
With Ju Hua, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency with Jing and Blood unable to rise and nourish the eyes with tinnitus, headache, and visual impairment.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, calms the Liver Yang, extinguishes Wind and detoxifies.
With Chuan Xiong, for headache due to Wind-Heat or Liver Yang Rising.
Tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing, astringes sweat, generates fluids, quiets the Spirit and calms and contains Heart Qi.
Disperses and scatters Wind-Heat, calms the Liver and cools the Blood.

With Ju Hua, cools and calms the Liver, for Liver channel Wind-Heat or Liver blazing upward with red, swollen eyes, watery eyes that are sensitive to light and vertigo and dizziness from Liver Yang Rising.
With Hei Zhi Ma and Gou Qi Zi, for dizziness, blurred vision, tinnitus, and headache due to Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiencies with ascendant Yang.
Nourishes Heart Yin, tonifies the Liver Blood, calms the Spirit, astringes sweat and generates fluids.
Nourishes the Heart, calms the Spirit and astringes Yin Deficiency sweat.

With Suan Zao Ren, strongly quiets the Spirit, calms the emotions, enriches the Yin and Blood, stops nightsweats and treats palpitations, irritability and insomnia due to Yin and Blood Deficiency failing to nourish the Heart and Liver
Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and extinguishes Wind.
Nourishes the Blood, calms the Spirit and Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Strengthens the Liver and Kidneys
Nourishes the Blood
Calms the Spirit
Invigorates Blood
moves Qi
Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin

symptoms: Head pain with a hollow sensation brought on by movement

modifications.purpose: blurred vision due to Liver Blood Deficiency
numbness of the limbs due to Liver Blood Deficiency
